verses.verse: <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and prophesy to <S%H5012>them,<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> You <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys:<s%> <S%H935>Behold,<s%> I, even I, will bring a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on <S%H6>you,<s%> and I will destroy your high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

Your <S%H4196>altars<s%> shall become <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and your incense <S%H4196>altars<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and I will cast <S%H5307>down<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> men <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols;<s%> and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> your <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> your <S%H4196>altars.<s%>

In all your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> places the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste,<s%> and the high <S%H1116>places<s%> shall be <S%H3456>desolate;<s%> that your <S%H4196>altars<s%> may be laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> and made <S%H816>desolate,<s%> and your <S%H1544>idols<s%> may be <S%H7665>broken<s%> and <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and your incense <S%H2553>altars<s%> may be cut <S%H1438>down,<s%> and your <S%H4639>works<s%> may be <S%H4229>abolished.<s%>
The <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>you,<s%> and you shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Yet will I leave a <S%H3498>remnant,<s%> in that you shall have some that <S%H6412>escape<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> when you shall be <S%H2219>scattered<s%> through the <S%H776>countries.<s%>

Those of you that <S%H6412>escape<s%> shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> me among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where they shall be carried <S%H7617>captive,<s%> how that I have been <S%H7665>broken<s%> with their <S%H2181>lewd<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> which has <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H5869>me,<s%> and with their eyes, which play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols:<s%> and they shall <S%H6962>loathe<s%> <S%H6440>themselves<s%> in their own sight for the <S%H7451>evils<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> in all their <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>
They shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> I have not <S%H1696>said<s%> in <S%H2600>vain<s%> that I would <S%H6213>do<s%> this evil to <S%H7451>them.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5221>Strike<s%> with your <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and <S%H7554>stamp<s%> with your <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H253>Alas!<s%> because of all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

He who is far <S%H7350>off<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and he who is <S%H7138>near<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and he who <S%H7604>remains<s%> and is <S%H5341>besieged<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine:<s%> thus will I <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my wrath on <S%H2534>them.<s%>

You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when their <S%H2491>slain<s%> men shall be <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> on every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> on all the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and under every <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H424>oak,<s%> the <S%H4725>places<s%> where they <S%H5414>offered<s%> <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to all their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H5414>them,<s%> and make the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> and <S%H4923>waste,<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> toward <S%H1689>Diblah,<s%> throughout all their <S%H4186>habitations:<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
